name: Contra Costa County Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Contra Costa County library card
fullDescription: Contra Costa County Library provides free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming media, and learning platforms for cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming movies and TV
- Online learning platforms
- Research databases
- Digital magazines and newspapers
- Language learning resources
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Contra Costa County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit ccclib.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
keywords: Contra Costa County Library, digital resources, ebooks, audiobooks, Libby, streaming, online learning, databases, language learning
